attributes.action: People from the commonwealth with NHS and NIN numbers in fear of deportation.
attributes.background: Anthony Brian/Bryan a father and grandfather who was interviewed by Jon Snow on Channel 4 news; who in his sixties and having to report to immigration every week not knowing whether he is going to be held or deported.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
